name: Creator Transcript Pull
description: Runs after creator-monitor. Pulls transcripts from flagged uploads. Adjust timing to run 1 hour after your monitor job.

payload.message:
Use yoinkit to pull transcripts from the latest videos by these creators:
- YouTube: @MrBeast, @mkbhd, @ali-abdaal

For each creator, get their feed, find the most recent video, and pull the transcript. Summarize each video in 3-4 bullet points: main topic, key takeaways, and anything I could riff on or respond to with my own content.
